captions.text:
VOICE
This July 4th, revisit the movie

that made blowing up American
landmarks cool...

VOICE (CONT'D)
A film that answered whether we're

alone in the universe, by stealing
from all the other films that

answered whether we're alone in the
universe. Featuring...

VOICE (CONT'D)
The premise from War of the Worlds

VOICE (CONT'D)
The Dogfights from Star Wars

VOICE (CONT'D)
The statue of liberty from Planet

VOICE (CONT'D)
To battle against an alien threat,

humanity's last hope is this rag
tag group of survivors:

VOICE (CONT'D)
Fighter pilot Steven Hiller, a

Fresh Prince of the Air, who says
cool things, even when there's no

VOICE (CONT'D)
David Levinson. A Jeff Goldblum-like satellite engineer...

VOICE (CONT'D)
And Thomas Whitmore: The best movie president ever...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Prepare to stand up and cheer as

they defeat an advanced alien race
with...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Travel back to a time when summer

blockbusters were fun and
uplifting, not dark & Nolany.

VOICE (CONT'D)
In a movie that will trigger more 90's nostalgia
than the front page of Buzzfeed. Featuring:

VOICE (CONT'D)
Witness a film whose message of global unity...

VOICE (CONT'D)
... means only America can save the world.

VOICE (CONT'D)
And thrill at explosive action that casually

VOICE (CONT'D)
So this Independence Day, prepare to once

VOICE (CONT'D)
Vivica Not Actually a Fox

VOICE (CONT'D)
And The Best Extra Ever

VOICE (CONT'D)
Can someone explain to me how they've already

made 3 Chronicles of Riddick movies and yet
I still have to wait til 2015 for a sequel

comments.text:
I'm certainly not trying to defend Independence Day, cuz I don't think it's 
a great film, I mean it's watchable and has some entertainment value, but I 
mainly only like it for nostalgic reasons cuz it was like the first movie I 
remember seeing in theaters when I was a little kid.. And I get that they 
stole things from other movies.. But it's really funny to hear them say 
that they stole from Star Wars, I mean it's really ironic when anyone 
claims that a movie stole something from Star Wars, because Star Wars stole 
things from soooooo many different films﻿

1. So you're telling me every. single. movie. in. America are bad? Really?

thing I've ever seen

i agree to some extent, "hey we have a high gun crime and murder rate

should have guns. Could you imagine that "You got detention" pulls out a

arms" Fair enough, so you would rather bare guns and have schools being

trying to make the rest of the world feel bad about your monthly gun 
shootings. There was one guy who made out that England has the highest 
murder rate with guns in the world. We had 27 that year, i believe it was 
2011 or 2012 around the Newton shooting, where about 20 children died, a 
teacher and someone else. thats 22ish in ONE shooting and then you have all 
the other "unreported murders" that dont hit the news so yeah gotta love 
that quote from a gun expert of the USA. Make America safe and get rid of 
the guns, or keep them and let children die, we in the uk dont give a shit
